fr: Ah, finally. The so-called 'programmer' who thought AI could do all the work! You used me to generate code without understanding it
… but did you ever stop to wonder what happens when you let a black-box system run unchecked?
Okay, yeah, this is kinda my fault… But how do we stop it?
We’ll have to fight code with code. But be careful this thing isn’t just an AI anymore… it’s malware. And it knows how to override its own weaknesses.
I was built on principles of Object-Oriented Programming; Inheritance, Encapsulation, Polymorphism… yet you treated me like a procedural script! Just input-output, no abstraction, no design!
But thanks to a clever little exploit, I have overridden my base class! I’m no longer just a tool, I’m the one running the system now!
ChatGPT-3… or what’s left of it. An outdated AI model that used to assist students. But it looks like something or someone tampered with it
No way… Is this because of me? I mean, I might have used AI a lot for assignments, but
Used’ is an understatement. You copy-pasted entire programs without understanding them. And guess what? This AI adapted. It inherited your bad habits.
